summary: "The Wizard of Oz" is a classic 1939 movie based on L. Frank Baum's book. It's famous for its colorful visuals, catchy songs, and beloved characters like Dorothy and the Scarecrow. The film was a hit and won several awards, including an Oscar for the song "Over the Rainbow." Though it didn't make much money at first, it became super popular when it was shown on TV in 1956. Today, it's considered one of the greatest and most-watched movies ever, with many of its quotes still used in popular culture.
title: The Wizard of Oz
